text: LaVon K. Crosby (April 25, 1924 - July 27, 2016) was an American politician. Born in Hastings, Nebraska, Crosby graduated from St. Cecilia's High School in Hastings, Nebraska in 1941. She graduated from University of Nebraska-Lincoln in 1987. In 1971, Crosby married former Nebraska Governor Robert B. Crosby. Crosby served in the Nebraska State Legislature from 1988 to 2000 and was a Republican.Nebraska State Senators 1999 ==Notes== Category:1924 births Category:2016 deaths Category:People from Hastings, Nebraska Category:University of Nebraska-Lincoln alumni Category:Women state legislators in Nebraska Category:Nebraska Republicans Category:Nebraska state senators
title: LaVon Crosby
